questions: Q. 1. Name the country which follows ‘coming together’ style of federalism.
Q. 2. Which subjects are included in the Union List ?
answers: Ans. Defence of the nation, foreign affairs, banking, currency, communication.

questions: Q. 3. Which type of government has two or more levels ?
Q. 4. Which subjects falls under the concurrent list ?
answers: Ans. Marriage, education, forest, trade unions, adoption and succession.

questions: Q. 5. The subject of Computer Software comes under which list ?
Q. 6. In case of any dispute about the division of powers who can make a decision ?
answers: Ans. The High Court and the Supreme Court can make a decision.

questions: Q. 7. Which subjects are included in the state list ?
answers: Ans. Agriculture, police, public health, land.

questions: Q. 8. Which groups of countries are an example of holding together federation ?
Q. 9. The federal system serves which two dual objectives ?
answers: Ans. First, to safeguard and promote unity of the country and secondly, to accomodate regional diversity. 1
